main: ^Hi! excuse me, i dropped my wallet somewhere in the station, someone may have found it, could it be here?
^Good morning, i'm sorry, i need to verify that the wallet is actually yours.

g-0: ^Pedro Martinez, is a black wallet, it has my name engraved on the back.
^All right i have it right here, someone brought it a few minutes ago
g-1: ^Thank you so much, i can't continue my trip without it

convo: ^You seem in a hurry, mind if i ask where you're going

g-0: ^My family left already, have no business in this dying city anymore

2d: ^I hope everything turns fine for you and your family
